issue.title: ParentIdentifier: child points to an older version of its parent metadata
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

The element parentIdentifier isn't captured correctly by EasySDI. 
By mistake, the automatically captured parentID of a metadata (during the edition process) belongs to a parent metadata of an older version.

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Problem came from the SQL query getting the metadata parent guid through link between object versions.
Fixed.
